newsitem.title: USA: BB&T Corp completes UCB acquisition.
newsitem.headline: BB&T Corp completes UCB acquisition.

text.p: BB&T Corp, a bank holding company with $26.5 billion in assets, said Wednesday it has completed its acquisition of United Carolina Bancshares.

BB&T said Whiteville, N.C.,-based United Carolina will continue to operate its branches under the UCB name until its systems convert to BB&T in mid-September. UCB, with assets of $4.4 billion, operates 153 branches in the Carolinas.
BB&T will have 485 banking offices in the Carolinas and Virgina when the UCB system conversion is completed, it said.
